message.body: Hey Sam. I meant to text you earlier but I've had work the past two days. It's been so hard to coordinate a time for everyone to meet Jeff so if Friday works for everyone, don't cancel because of me. If you go out for dinner, I can meet up with you afterwards or possibly meet in the middle of dinner. It's totally fine. Everyone wants to meet him and I don't want to delay it any longer. Haha.
It will give me something to look forward to after a long day of work too. Haha.
Well that's nice of you, but I already told him that since everyone
couldn't make it, we could all meet up another time. So... I'm
Man! Ok. But hopefully we meet him soon :)
Sorry, I thought we were going with what was said on Sunday. Yeah, hopefully it won't be too much longer!
